badges.name: Triad Bloom
badges.description: Reflecting the growth and development inherent in reaching the next step.

badges.name: Penta Harmony
badges.description: Indicating the harmony and balance achieved after five days.

badges.name: Octa Sync
badges.description: Representing the synchronization of the user's efforts with their mood tracking routine.

badges.name: Harmonic Thirteen
badges.description: Highlighting the significance of reaching a 13-day streak.

badges.name: Triple Helix
badges.description: Reflecting the deepening commitment at the 21-day mark in the Fibonacci sequence.

badges.name: Tetra Flow
badges.description: Echoing the continual progress and flow as the user hits a 34-day streak.

badges.name: Double Nickels
badges.description: Marking the halfway point to a triple-digit streak, emphasizing sustained effort.

badges.name: Octa-Nona Leap
badges.description: Celebrating the leap towards a higher level of commitment at an 89-day streak.

badges.name: Fibonacci Apex
badges.description: A special badge that celebrates reaching the 100-day milestone, integrating the Fibonacci concept.
